title: I actually found out the guy I was dating has cheated on me
body:
And I found out this morning on a facebook post that he was getting cuddled by someone else and he baked them dinner and stuff. This person tagged them in their FB post.

Devastated? 

Wow, like I am actually in tears all day. I did great on a final exam I had but now I am done that I am crumbling.

I hate my life. Literlaly hate it and idgaf it you think I am trolling. I actually cannot find a man that wants a stable relationship and I hate it. 

I feel like total fucking shit and I HATEEEEEE life.
